website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe refrigerator and freezer that won't break your budget and may serve you well both now and in the future.
pros: Includes a reversible door that makes it simple to fit the unit in any spot
Offers an integrated door handle and smooth-back design that delivers a superb combination of function and fashion
Adjustable shelves ensure you can quickly and effortlessly clean the unit as needed
Can be set up in just minutes
cons: Won't necessarily keep items cool at all times
Does not provide as much storage space as comparable models

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for a small room or office ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a small room or office. I've been running the fridge for a little over a month now. No issues. I would suggest buying a motion activated LED light for inside the fridge as its very dark. I used this one  and its working well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: I would do business with this company again.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator arrived early and was very easy to set-up. I have only used it a few days, but it works perfectly. Ordering the product and it's delivery were perfect. It is a good looking design and I am looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Moira D.

customer_reviews.title: Would like to say that I'm very happy with my mini ...
customer_reviews.text: Would like to say that I'm very happy with my mini fridge. However the initial description says it is 4.5 cu ft and has a drawer. Later in the detailed description it calls it a 3.2 and no mention of a drawer. I received a 3.2 cu ft. and am very pleased but wasn't really sure what I was getting until it got here.
customer_reviews.author: Karla VonHagel

customer_reviews.title: Della Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized refrigerator for an office and I've been using it for a month or so now. It holds lots of contents and is quite cold. It was inexpensive and well rated. I'm buying another one for another office.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B. Clift

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: Love it.Item received in good condition, Works excellent for my needs.Cost effective, Best bang for the buck Thanks Greg .S.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine. Cools things and freezer freezes ice. The only thing is that it’s hella loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge is doing the job well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for bedroom~
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Good size for my small room. Light weight. Very little frost buildup. I'm super happy with it. :D
customer_reviews.author: LoveIsBlue

customer_reviews.title: Mini fridge without inside bulb
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like was it came without a lightbulp. It didn't say that on the picture. Otherwise I could've bought another one instead of what I bought!
customer_reviews.author: IronAngel#1

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and in great condition. We are well pleased
customer_reviews.text: Exactly suits our needs. Delivered on time and in great condition. We are well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ann lear

customer_reviews.title: Will not keep the smallest amount of food cool. Customer service is even worst
customer_reviews.text: Will not keep the smallest amount of food cool. Customer service is even worst.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Jennings

customer_reviews.title: small refrigerator review
customer_reviews.text: Looks great...great features...works perfectly. Received on time, in good condition. Very quiet...easy to access...I guess that's all I have to say!
customer_reviews.author: Roger McCFormick

product_meta.title: Della Upright Mini Refrigerator Freezer Dorm Compact Small Fridge Single Reversible Door 3.2 Cubic Feet, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDella 3.2 Cu. Ft. Compact Refrigerator, is energy efficient refrigeration in a convenient, compact unit. Perfect for small spaces, this model makes a great addition to the student dorm room or small office. With a reversible door hinge, an integrated door handle and a smooth-back design, this handy refrigerator will fit almost anywhere Features: Ideal for smaller areas such as student dormitories, wet bars, apartments and condos. Reversible door hinge adapts easily for right or left door opening Perfect place to store your microwave or other items when space constrained Adjustable shelves help contain messes, so your refrigerator stays clean Stock and dispense all of your favorite beverages with ease Integrated door handle Sleek look that easily enhances most types of existing decor Strong shelves for maximum storage versatility Integrated door shelving with tall bottle storage It also uses , natural R600a refrigerant to help our environment Thermostat Offers easy adjustments to keep your snacks at an ideal temperature Specifications: Color: Black Refrigerator Type: Compact Power: 115v/60hzAmp:&: R600aCapacity (Cu. Ft.): 3.2Freezer Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 0.3Fresh Food Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 2.9Door Style: Single Door Freezer Compartment: Yes Reversible Door: Yes Interior Light: Nonadjustable Legs: Yes Energy consumption(Kwh/24h): 243kWHTemperature Control: Safety Listing: Yes Overall Dimension: 17-3/4"(W) x 19-1/4"(L) x 31-1/4"(H)Package Include: Compact Refrigerator Manual*Note Our digital images are as accurate as possible. However, different monitors may cause colors to vary slightly*.
feature_bullets: QUICK & QUIET: The DELLA Compact Mini Fridge comes with a number of user-friendly features for convenience and ease of use. Low energy consumption: cuts down on electrical bill Invisible door handle Built-in door can holder.

PERFECT FOR PARTIES: 3.2 cu. ft .compact freezer has wire shelves that make it easy to load and remove items. Beautiful Finish, this attractive mini Fridge will more than meet all your needs. Upright Mini Fridge is a perfect size for a single person, small family.

CONVENIENT DESIGN: Place the DELLA Mini Fridge on your tabletop, countertop or other sturdy service. Recessed handle provides a flush finish with the door. Adjustable temperature control to select your desired temperature.

TAKE IT ANYWHERE: The portable DELLA Mini Fridge has the ability to connect directly any outlet. Overall Dimension: 17-3/4"(W) x 19-1/2"(H) x 25"(H). This refrigerator cools quickly and evenly, and it will keep foods perfectly chilled. It is an excellent value that will bring years of quiet, reliable use.

LARGE STORAGE CAPACITY: The DELLA Mini Fridge is ideal for tiny homes, condos, efficiency apartments, RVs, or any small space. The color door and cabinet offer a sleek, clean look and the flush-back design helps conserve space in your home or office. Fresh food capacity gives you the space to keep foods organized.
